standard_metadata.standard_description: Know relative sizes of measurement units within one system of units including km, m, cm; kg, g; lb, oz.; l, ml; hr, min, sec. Within a single system of measurement, express measurements in a larger unit in terms of a smaller unit. Record measurement equivalents in a two-column table.
standard_metadata.standard_title: Estimating length (in, ft, yd, and mi)

question.content: **Identify the most reasonable unit to measure the length of a banana.**

hints.content: Measure | Length  :- | :-  Inch | About the length of a quarter Foot | About the length of an adult shoe Yard | About the length of a guitar  Mile |  About the length of $10$ city blocks
Which of these is the most reasonable unit to measure the length of a banana?
Inches is the most reasonable unit to measure the length of a banana.

question.content: **Which is closest to the width of a slice of bread?**

hints.content: Measure | Length  :- | :-  Inch | About the length of a quarter Foot | About the length of an adult shoe Yard | About the length of a guitar  Mile |  About the length of $10$ city blocks
Is the width of a slice of bread closer to $4$ inches, $4$ feet, or $4$ yards?
The width of a slice of bread is about $4$ inches.
